calculation_logic.abstract: Triggers a validation failure if the yield prediction accuracy deviates by more than 15% from the training baseline over a 30-day window.
calculation_logic.sql_standard: SELECT CASE WHEN (ABS(baseline_accuracy - current_accuracy) / baseline_accuracy) > 0.15 THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END FROM monitor.model_performance_logs

calculation_logic.abstract: Ensures that GPS coordinates are rounded to 3 decimal places to mask specific farm ownership in public-facing sustainability reports as per GDPR Recital 26.
calculation_logic.sql_standard: UPDATE gold.public_agri_stats SET latitude = ROUND(latitude, 3), longitude = ROUND(longitude, 3)
